report.title: Noman's DMT Extraction a Success
report.author: DrGonzo
report.bodytext: After two failures trying to do QT's (patience intensive) DMT extraction, I tried Noman's 'DMT For the Masses' extraction, and the results were great. /n /n 1) I pulverized 27 grams of rootbark in a blender, then froze and thawed the plant material twice in order to break down the plant's cellular structure. /n /n 2) Made a solution of 405ml of water with 27 of NaOH* (aka lye). /n /n 3) Put both the the powdered plant material and NaOH solution in a mason jar, shook vigorously for approximately 1 hour as I watched TV. The jar heated up significantly during this reaction. Pressure also built up inside it, requiring me to vent it every few minutes to avoid a very unwanted detonation. /n /n 4) After solution ceased giving off heat, I transferred it to a seperatory funnel and added 30ml of Coleman Fuel (naptha). The seperatory funnel was then capped and turned end-over-end for several minutes. This was done periodically for three hours. The naptha was then seperated and put in a beaker. /n /n 5) Repeated step 4 one more time with the same plant juice. /n /n 6) All the naptha was combined into a single beaker and put in the freezer over night. /n /n 7) The next morning, hundreds of pretty little crystals were covering the glass. I poured the naptha through a coffee filter into a collection jar, then scraped all the crystals onto the filter and let them dry. /n /n 8) Crystals were washed with non-sudsy ammonia, dried, and put to use! Done in less than 24 hours! /n /n *Be CAREFUL with NaOH, people!
